pullrequest.title: Save buttons to the right, cancel buttons to the left

content.raw:
just want to confirm:

- by default, pressing enter cancels the save dialog. I tried libre office and gimp and it seems like the default should be save?

- pressing escape currently has no effect - should it cancel and close the dialog?

@spaepcke
